comments: Hield (IND) maintains a legal guarding position, and cleanly blocks the play at the rim during the driving shot attempt by Okoro (CLE).

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Okoro (CLE) is last to make contact with the ball before it goes out of bounds on the sideline.
Smith (IND) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Wade (CLE) firms up, and absorbs the contact.
Mobley (CLE) maintains a legal pivot foot at the end of his drive.
Brogdon (IND) legally contests Mobley's (CLE) jump shot attempt.
Haliburton (IND) saves the ball prior to it going out of bounds.
Markkanen (CLE) makes marginal contact to Brogdon's (IND) body during the drive that he is able to move through and continue his path to the basket.
Markkanen (CLE) makes marginal contact with Brogdon (IND) body during his shooting motion that does not affect his driving shot attempt.
Mobley (CLE) makes contact with the ball after it hits the backcourt. A defensive goaltend was correctly assessed.
Garland (CLE) raises his off-arm into Smith's (IND) arm, which is not in an illegal position as he gathers and enters his upward shooting motion. The contact is marginal.
Smith (IND) commits a take foul on Garland (CLE).
Hield (IND) commits a take foul on Stevens (CLE).
